div.p: We are grateful for the financial support provided for this study by the Climate Change and Health Promotion Unit (CCHPU) of the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Bangladesh, under the project of Climate Change Trust of the Ministry of Environment and Forest. We thank the study participants, the project director, project staff, trainers, and data collectors of CCHPU and Health Communication Network.
